def_cn: 冒犯的；得罪人的；唐突的;无礼的
def_en: Something that is offensive upsets or embarrasses people because it is rude or insulting.
A military offensive is a carefully planned attack made by a large group of soldiers.

def_cn: （表示愤怒或反对的）强硬行动
def_en: See also:charm offensive; If you conduct an offensive, you take strong action to show how angry you are about something or how much you disapprove of something.

def_cn: （体育运动中球队）进攻的，攻方的
def_en: In sports such as American football or basketball, the offensive team is the team which has possession of the ball and is trying to score.

def_cn: 采取强势行动；采取攻势
def_en: If you go on the offensive ,go over to the offensive, or take the offensive, you begin to take strong action against people who have been attacking you.
